explanation: [0-0] In an indoor environment, a man wearing a dark red short-sleeved shirt sits in front of a foosball table with a mini soccer ball in his mouth. He stares ahead with wide eyes. Behind him is a white wall, with a window in the upper right corner. The English subtitle "Guess The Song" in white letters on a red background is at the bottom of the screen.

[0-2] First, the man in the dark red short-sleeved shirt spits the mini soccer ball forward. The subtitles disappear. The scene cuts to the man in the dark red short-sleeved shirt turning his head to the left, looking forward. A mini soccer ball flies into his mouth from the left. He spits the mini soccer ball back to the left. The scene cuts again, the man's head is on the left side of the screen, facing right. He spits the mini soccer ball to the right, it flies back into his mouth, and then he spits it out to the right again.

[0-2] First, the man in the dark red short-sleeved shirt spits the mini soccer ball forward. The subtitles disappear. The scene cuts to the man in the dark red short-sleeved shirt turning his head to the left, looking forward. A mini soccer ball flies into his mouth from the left. He spits the mini soccer ball back to the left. The scene cuts again, the man's head is on the left side of the screen, facing right. He spits the mini soccer ball to the right, it flies back into his mouth, and then he spits it out to the right again.

[2-4] Then the scene cuts to the man in the dark red short-sleeved shirt facing forward, spitting out a mini soccer ball. The mini soccer ball flies back into his mouth, and he spits it out forward again. The mini soccer ball hits one of the foosball players. Next, the man's head is on the right side of the screen, his eyes glancing forward, a mini soccer ball flying into his mouth from the left. The scene cuts to the man spitting a mini soccer ball forward.

[2-4] Then the scene cuts to the man in the dark red short-sleeved shirt facing forward, spitting out a mini soccer ball. The mini soccer ball flies back into his mouth, and he spits it out forward again. The mini soccer ball hits one of the foosball players. Next, the man's head is on the right side of the screen, his eyes glancing forward, a mini soccer ball flying into his mouth from the left. The scene cuts to the man spitting a mini soccer ball forward.

[4-7] After that, the man's head is on the right side of the screen, facing left, eyes glancing forward. A mini soccer ball flies into his mouth from the left. The scene cuts to the man's head on the left side of the screen, facing right. He spits the mini soccer ball out twice. Then he faces forward and spits out the mini soccer ball twice more. Afterwards, he faces left and spits the mini soccer ball out twice again. Finally, the man in the dark red short-sleeved shirt holds a mini soccer ball in his mouth, stares ahead with wide eyes, and the picture freezes.
